Protocol# NSViewContentSelectionInfo

macOS

```
protocol NSViewContentSelectionInfo : NSObjectProtocol
```

## [ Mentioned in ](/documentation/AppKit/NSViewContentSelectionInfo#mentions)

[ Supporting Writing Tools via the pasteboard ](/documentation/appkit/supporting-writing-tools-via-the-pasteboard)## [Overview](/documentation/AppKit/NSViewContentSelectionInfo#overview)

A protocol to request information from NSView subclasses about the selected content in the view.
